text: [Allakh] skazhet: "Voydite v ad vmeste s lyud'mi i dzhinnami, kotoryye ushli [iz zhizni] zadolgo do vas ". Kazhdyy raz, kogda vkhodit [v ad] kakoy-libo narod, on proklinayet podobnyy sebe [po vere]. Kogda oni soberutsya v adu vse vmeste, to posledovateli skazhut o svoikh predvoditelyakh: "Gospodi nash! Vot oni i sbili nas s puti very: vozday zhe im v adu nakazaniyem vdvoyne". [Allakh] skazhet: "Kazhdomu [iz nikh] vozdayetsya vdvoyne, no vy ne vedayete ob etom
